to play it with the embeded subs ffdshow Video Decoder>[Select Language]

MPC Play>Filters>ffdshow Video Decoder>[Select Language]
VLC Video>Subtitles Track>[Select Language]

Very good audio and video quality. I used MKVMerge to remove the extraneous subtitles. I also changed the file extension from the container form (.mkv) to a more commonly used .mp4. Thank you uploader.
